author: asmuts
msg: Removed double check locking from example.

author: asmuts
msg: Moved removal in update  into synchronized block.  This solved the periodic map != list error.

author: kevlar
msg: Added JCSWorker, JCSWorkerHelper, and AbstractJCSWorkerHelper to CVS. These are designed to make using JCS easier by supplying the most common pattern of usage: Get, if null, do the work, put, and return the result.

author: kevlar
msg: Changed the name to be the same as the file. (talk about a dumb mistake)

author: kevlar
msg: Changed the CacheEventQueue to use a static PooledExecutor and a BoundedBuffer to queue up and execute events asynchronusly. This is necessary because the present design creates one thread per active region, which on a system with many active regions or many caches talking to a remote cache, this can quickly overload the system with thread creation.
